# IntentModes.ForegroundMode

**Structure**

A type defining specific foreground behaviors for an app intent.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ForegroundMode
```

## Overview

The set of options you use to specify when and how the system should bring your app to the foreground when it performs its action.

## Type Properties

- **deferred**: The system brings the app to the foreground while it performs the intent’s action or just before returning from its perform function.
- **dynamic**: The system can bring the app to the foreground dynamically while it performs the intent’s action, depending on runtime conditions.
- **immediate**: The system brings the app into the foreground immediately after it resolves the intent’s parameters.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
